snippet.title: Bally Fears : The Introduction Game - Trailer
snippet.description:
Music : Introduction to the Snow by Miracle Musical

Bally Fears: The Introduction Game

You play as a child named Reyes Spherikaw. Your mother passed away a few days ago, but Reyes doesn’t know this yet. Your father has brought you to his workplace because there was no one to look after you. The game begins when your father calls you to warn you about something…

We are a small independent game studio. There are three of us on the team, and we hope our work will appeal to many.

Download the game on:
- Itch.io - Bally Fears : The Introduction Game
- Gamejolt - Bally Fears : The Introduction Game
